label: 大般若波羅蜜多經
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 55th  . Nara National Museum . 2003
見出し読み: だいはんにゃはらみったきょう
説明文: Mahā-prajńā-pāaramitā-sūtra in 600 fascicles, translated into Chinese by Xuanzang (?-664) from 660-663. A collection of sixteen sutras, short and long, which articulate the doctrine of Perfection of Wisdom" (Skt. Prajńāpāramitā). [玄奘] "
